description: Zoho is a suite of cloud applications including CRM, email marketing, and collaboration tools, enabling businesses to automate and scale operations

capabilities.name: ZOHO_CONVERT_ZOHO_LEAD
capabilities.description: Converts a lead into a contact, account, and optionally a deal in Zoho CRM.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_CREATE_ZOHO_RECORD
capabilities.description: Creates new records in a specified module in Zoho CRM.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_CREATE_ZOHO_TAG
capabilities.description: Creates new tags in Zoho CRM.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_GET_ZOHO_RECORDS
capabilities.description: Retrieves records from a specified module in Zoho CRM. Notes: - Discrete (page/per_page) pagination is limited to the first 2,000 records. To retrieve records beyond this, use token-based pagination via page_token from the previous response's info.next_page_token. - Do not use page together with page_token. - You cannot use cvid together with sort_by.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_UPDATE_RELATED_RECORDS
capabilities.description: Associates or updates relationships between records across different modules in Zoho CRM.

capabilities.name: ZOHO_UPDATE_ZOHO_RECORD
capabilities.description: Updates existing records in a specified module in Zoho CRM.
